subject: Basketball
Trades (Sports)
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Jason Kidd, who was set to rejoin Dallas, made a late and stunning reversal and agreed to join the Knicks instead, while Jeremy Lin agreed to an offer sheet with Houston.
snippet: Jason Kidd, who was set to rejoin Dallas, made a late and stunning reversal and agreed to join the Knicks instead, while Jeremy Lin agreed to an offer sheet with Houston.
